argument.description: An expression, such as a column name, that provides the value for which to determine the ratio. The expression must have either a numeric data type or be implicitly convertible to one. You cannot use any other analytic function in ratio_expression.
Optional. An expression that sets the range of records for each group in the OVER clause.

description: Calculates the ratio of a value to the sum of the values in a window or partition. The ratio to report value is determined using the formula:
